column3: â€œIt smells like Jet Fuel and has a smooth creeping clear high. The strain will make you very energetic but also make you hella paranoid. This is an alternative to adderall as a study aid, because it gives you hyper focus, so for its perfect for programmers. I bought a 32g OZ (4 extra grams for first patients) for $125 from SRC Wellness Group in La Puente, CA.â€

â€œI decided to buy some Lemon Jack for my  weekend at Coachella, and WOW! I rarely felt the need to re-energize with a coffee or redbull, just a few puffs and I had renewed energy and stamina! This is a strong strain, one of the strongest sativas I've ever smoked actually, and a new friend of mine felt extremely anxious from this so I definitely do NOT recommend this for those of you who overthink or are edgy naturally...â€

â€œLemon Jack is the first sativa I've had in at LEAST 2 years, and what a lovely reintroduction! I'd almost forgotten what it feels like to be stoned AND energized. Being a mom (and not a HUGE fan of coffee), I need SOMETHING, yo! I am not a robot. Summon the Lemon Jack!

Is it just me, or does Lemon Jack smell MORE like a lemon than an actual lemon? Nothing compares... Except maybe how it smells after you grind it. Th...â€
â€œthe most energetic, focused strain ive had.â€

â€œsolid 4/5. super mellow body buzz with a slight brain tingle. sweet smell, very tasteful. great buzz for physical activity or any event. youre still coherant yet kinda wrecked at the same time. harmony. 10/10 would purchase again *thumbs up*â€

â€œThis is a cup of coffee in flower form.
I'm not usually impressed by sativas, but this one surprised me. 
First off, the buds were a gorgeous, deep green hue speckled by burnt sienna hairs and a fuzzy, off yellow coating of kief. They were mostly loose and small buds. Flower's aroma was very pungent and slightly chemical, like lemon Pine Sol. 
Burned at a very good rate, taste was sour/chemical/lemon, not unlike skun...â€

â€œmy favorite by far. I've been searching for this ever since I smoked it, a few years ago. But I will continue my search!  super potent chemical lemon smell, just as described. split a roach, and got super high with just one hit.â€

â€œNot sure if this is the same as Super Lemon Jack, but I absolutely love this strain! Great for those who don't smoke often. I am a habitual smoker and still get an awesome high with this one! It's energizing and gets you in an superb mood! The only thing i felt was disappointing about this strain is that the high doesn't last as long as I'd wish. The come down is gradual and a bit draining, although I'm not too sure ...â€

â€œmy favorite by far. I've been searching for this ever since I smoked it, a few years ago. But I will continue my search!  super potent chemical lemon smell, just as described. split a roach, and got super high with just one hit.â€

â€œLemon Jack was suggested to me as a great strain to help with depression, motivation, and productivity. Holy Freakin Crap! The first time I smoked it I raked all of the leaves in the yard. The second time I smoked it I vacuumed my bedroom, cleaned the laundry room, and cleaned the entire kitchen. This is totally my go to strain for getting shit done. I love it! The come down isn't too bad either. The only problem is ...â€
â€œi love the lemony aroma, like  Irish spring  in the morning, a great way to start the day!â€
â€œNice Buds red hairs frosty crystals and STICKY.â€
â€œI'd give a 4.5 but site won't allow.  It's an excellent strain if you are into a balanced hybrid that is big" in both departments.  The smell is similar to Grapefruit strain
column4: or any of the big citrus bombs. Citrus jet fuel

column2: and I am prone to anxiety occasionally and with certain strains. A little dry mouth but not a big deal.

column3: â€œOne of the best tasting strains I've vaped a sweet and citrusy flavour. The scent is also very lemony. This is a sativa power house child,  it's parents being lemon haze and Jack Herrer.  Amazing strain!â€
â€œOne of my favorites! This strain keeps me energetic and productive and the high never last more than an hourâ€
â€œLove this strain! Optimistic, motivated, and capable feeling. Gets your creative juices flowing to tackle big projects, & enjoy doing it. New favoriteâ€

â€œOne of the best tasting strains I've vaped a sweet and citrusy flavour. The scent is also very lemony. This is a sativa power house child,  it's parents being lemon haze and Jack Herrer.  Amazing strain!â€

â€œStep right up & get Energized, Uplifted, Happy, & Mellow with this slightly sticky Sativa that has 21% THC & is cultivated by Viola. Firm, light medium green popcorn nugs with orange/brown pistils. Amber peach fuzz & crystal trichomes are bountiful. Scents/Flavors are lemon, citrus, & Jack Herer (mint/pepper/chemical). Delightful pleasure for ones eyes, nose, mouth, and...brain!â€

â€œI picked up some extremely good wax. I guess it was wax, it was almost a solid foamy consistency. I took one dab and felt like I was gonna go through the ceiling when I stood up. Was giggly and fell asleep afterward. Felt awesome to only need one or two puffs to clear your head.â€
â€œOne of my favorites! This strain keeps me energetic and productive and the high never last more than an hourâ€
â€œReally focused with a little creativity.good for getting things doneâ€

â€œThe taste is wonderful, and it's a very energetic high. I don't recommend this strain if you have an anxiety disorder, but if you do have anxiety and decide to smoke Lemon Jack, just stay where you feel comfortable and you'll be okay :)â€

â€œI've been using this stain for a while now and trust me, 100% of my pain is gone! It has a great high got you positive thinking and relaxed for 2-3 hours. Great for a wake and bake. No crashing effects. Very smooth landing after the high! Highly recommend for any type of pain. Especially chronic pain.â€

â€œMeh, I am not a fan, vaping flower in my G Pen. Leafly' description of it is spot on, peppery and spicy flavor definitely comes through. I do not feel anxious with it, but i definitely feel the Sativa head high and relaxed. I bought this flower with some Strawberry Cough, and unfortunately for this strain, the SC beats this strain by miles for me. Maybe I should not buy flower I like with new flowers i have not tried...â€

â€œA variation of Jack Herer,  gives it a lemon twist, nicer tasting than the typical floor cleaner green tea  menthol of straight JH, and I find the Lemon Jack is a bit more edgy energetic than JH. â€œLemon Jack is a great strain if you're looking for a creative energetic buzz. I feel literally no sign of fatigue when I smoke Lemon Jack, and it just completely energizes my mind. My focus gets really intense and it's one of the few strains I can smoke before doing work. However, the comedown is really intense and I usually just knock out as soon as it happens, so beware. Oh, also I get insane cottonmouth when I smo...â€

â€œI dont usually review weed, but i made an access  just so that i could rate this herb.  it is the best I've ever smoked, by far.  I smoked half a one paper the first time and was totally wrecked the rest of the night.  you don't need much, 2 deep draws at most if you want to go to work the next day.  it kicks in fast.  an enveloping sense of euphoria along with a nice body high.  food tastes great on this weed but it...â€

â€œI really wanted to love this strain, because I love the smell of lemon in my weed. It was an energetic high, too much so for me. It made me very anxious and my head race. I can see this being nice for those who don't have issues with anxiety, but skip it if you do.â€

â€œLemon Jack is a great strain to consume if you want the stimulation without the psychoactivity.  It does have a bit of a body kick to it, as both Jack Herer and Skunk varieties do, however, it is quite a bit more of a shaky-too-many-cups-of-coffee buzz than it is a euphoric one. That being said, it is certainly energizing, but I personally prefer mood elevating properties in my cannabisâ€
